ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 249
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ya know, I ve come to realize you can make about 2K/hour by farming tradeskill items, so suddenly 10K doesn t seem worth $25. The northeast corner of
ygData.messageBody:
--- EQCheats@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> 10 k plat 24.95 !! on all server but mac other everquest goodies

Ya know, I've come to realize you can make about 2K/hour by farming
tradeskill items, so suddenly 10K doesn't seem worth $25.

The northeast corner of Feerott spawns scores of spiders, so I can gather two
or three silks there in a bad hour, or I can go to innothule and get the same
with a little more work, plus farm zombie skins. Zombie skins and spiderling
silks are a minimum of 10pp EACH (that's 200pp per stack) right now. Last
night I sold two stacks (I should have brought up more) for 14.9pp per silk.

If I actually make sure keep enough silks in inventory and my trader up
whenever I'm not playing, I can make enough for a horse within a week or so
with minimal play. In fact, right now I have enough for my second horse, I
bought my wife a Ceremonial Iksar Chestplate for 6K just recently.



=====
The people are difficult to keep in order
because those above them interfere.
-- Lao Tzu, /I Ching/
